item.title: Logo Cap

item.description:
This 6-panel structured cap is all about comfort, style and fit. With an adjustable closure, it fits most head sizes. We'll stitch your logo or message in vibrant colour.

The post Logo Cap appeared first on Purr Hut.
item.content:encoded:
This 6-panel structured cap is all about comfort, style and fit. With an adjustable closure, it fits most head sizes. We’ll stitch your logo or message in vibrant colour.

  • Vista exclusive product
  • 100% brushed cotton
  • 6-panel structured
  • Adjustable strap
  • One size fits most

Care instructions: Spot-clean only. To preserve the cap shape and your design, we don’t recommend machine washing.

Stand-out embroidery
Custom text, company logos and club emblems look professional and vibrant when stitched on these caps. With a textured look that really stands out, embroidered hats are a great way to get people’s attention.

A cohesive team look
Create a consistent look for groups, teammates and colleagues. These caps make fun gifts, swag for potential customers or even part of a casual employee uniform. And with the adjustable strap, the size can be easily altered as needed.

The post Logo Cap appeared first on Purr Hut.
